document_data.mainbody:
Arth Tembroar was a saddler of the city of Arabel in Cormyr in the midâ€“14 century DR and a noted supporter of the Lost King Gondegal in his uprising of the .
Arth sold saddles out of Tembroars Fine Saddles on Dalarn Lane in Arabel.
During Gondegals war, Arth Tembroar was declared an outlaw in a proclamation penned by the Sage Royal Alaphondar on Ches 11, 1352 DR, and was wanted dead or alive by the crown.
